column3: TA}}</ref> Upon completion, he made Minas Anor his summer residence, which became the tradition of his successors.<ref>{{App

column2: 490}}, [[Gondor]] was invaded for the first time by [[Easterlings]].  Since Ostoher had become an old man his son [[Tarostar]] worked to defeat this threat.  Tarostar succeeded, but not until {{TA

column1: Ostoher's name was originally "Ostohir", which was changed to "Ostonir", and then finally "Ostoher" in the Second Edition of ''The Lord of the Rings''.<ref name="Elendil"/>
